abstract: Director Tim Burton explains stylistic choices for several characters and scenes in his latest film Miss Peregrine’s Home for Peculiar Children.

keywords.value: Miss Peregrine's Home for Peculiar Children (Movie)
keywords.name: creative_works

keywords.value: Miss Peregrine's Home for Peculiar Children (Book)
keywords.name: creative_works

lead_paragraph: For “Miss Peregrine’s Home for Peculiar Children,” based on a novel by Ransom Riggs, Mr. Burton sketched characters and more to create a new world.
snippet: For “Miss Peregrine’s Home for Peculiar Children,” based on a novel by Ransom Riggs, Mr. Burton sketched characters and more to create a new world....

headline.main: ‘Miss Peregrine’ and Tim Burton: The Making of a Film Fable
headline.print_headline: Book. Burton. And a Movie Fable Is Born.
